name: Forgotten Mines
description:
This is our first project making a first person shooter game on unity 3D, done in a few days.

In Forgotten Mines you control a guy who wears a revolver, and your objective is to find the secret treasure hidden in the dephts of an old mine. But be careful, because you won't be alone, maybe you can see some zombie miners on it, and they don't seem to be paceful.
